data_table.description: Form 45 - Current Supplements - current supplement name; vitamin and mineral type, dose, frequency, duration. This form was required for all OS participants. Data from Form 45 include daily nutrient intake from multivitamins and single supplements and types of supplements taken. The average intake per day from combination and/or single supplements for 25 nutrients has been calculated. In addition, variables indicating use of any type of supplement, multivitamins with or without minerals, stress tabs or other combination supplements are included.

variable.name: F45VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F45VITA
variable.comment: Average daily supplemental vitamin A, mcg RE

variable.name: F45VITE
variable.comment: Average daily supplemental alpha-tocopherol, IU

variable.name: F45VITB1
variable.comment: Average daily supplemental vitamin B1 (Thiamine), mg

variable.name: F45VTB12
variable.comment: Average daily supplemental vitamin B12, mcg

variable.comment: Average daily supplemental vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), mg

variable.comment: Average daily supplemental vitamin B6, mg

variable.comment: Average daily supplemental beta-carotene, mcg

variable.name: F45MVYR
variable.description: Multivitamin without Minerals adult years taken
variable.comment: Number of adult years using a multivitamin without minerals

variable.name: F45MVMYR
variable.description: Multivitamin with Minerals adult years taken
variable.comment: Number of adult years using a multivitamin with minerals

variable.description: Stress Formula Pills adult years taken
variable.comment: Number of adult years using a stress formula pill

variable.comment: Longest duration in years as an adult taking calcium from a combination pill or single supplement

variable.name: F45VITDY
variable.comment: Longest duration in years as an adult taking vitamin D from a combination pill or single supplement
